name: Jewel Legends Magical Kingdom HD - A Match 3 Puzzle Adventure
name_original: Jewel Legends Magical Kingdom HD - A Match 3 Puzzle Adventure
description:
Restore the magic kingdom to its former glory in this jewel-swapping adventure!

Collect precious jewels by forming rows of 3 or more jewels. Build beautiful buildings and the magnificent castle and be the Magical Kingdom’s savior!

Full Version Features:

* 140 levels and 8 magical tools
* Build marvelous structures such as the Crystal Forge, the Mage Tower and the magnificent castle
* 3 game modes: Adventure, Tournament and Freeplay – plus challenging mini-games!

Download and play today!
